analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/38/0x40e690e430710cfca6583b24d8c187b85b7fc1a7.sol:
	Contract DoubleKingsReward has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/38/0x40e690e430710cfca6583b24d8c187b85b7fc1a7.sol#199)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
